com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.ui.parsys

Class AemParsys

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognifide.qa.bb.aem.ui.parsys.AemParsys

  • public class AemParsys
extends Object
    Represents a parsys instance on the page.

      • setInsertComponentArea

        public void setInsertComponentArea(org.openqa.selenium.By insertComponentArea)
        This should be overriden only once at the beginning. Method allows to control nested parsys.
        Parameters:
        insertComponentArea - selector to component area

      • openInsertWindow

        public AemInsertWindow openInsertWindow()
        Opens insert window by double clicking the insert area.
        Returns:
        Insert window instance.

      • openInsertWindowByContextMenu

        public AemInsertWindow openInsertWindowByContextMenu()
        Opens insert window by context clicking the insert area and picking New... option from ContextMenu.
        Returns:
        Insert window instance.

      • pasteComponentByContextMenu

        public void pasteComponentByContextMenu()
        Pastes component by context clicking the insert area and picking Paste option from ContextMenu.

      • openContextMenuNthComponent

        public AemContextMenu openContextMenuNthComponent(Class<?> componentClass,
                                                  int n)
        Opens context menu for the n-th component of type componentClass. Indexing starts at 0.
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class
        n - component index
        Returns:
        opened contextMenu

      • openContextMenu

        public AemContextMenu openContextMenu(int n)
        Opens context menu for n-th component, no matter what type it is. Indexing starts at 0.
        Parameters:
        n - option index
        Returns:
        opened contextMenu

      • insertComponent

                                 String componentName)
        Inserts a component identified by the group and name.
        Parameters:
        componentGroup - component group name
        componentName - component name
        Returns:
        This AemParsys.

      • isComponentPresent

        public boolean isComponentPresent(Class<?> componentClass)
        Simply check if any component with a specific type is in parsys. Do not use it with negation, because of performance issues. In such cases use {#link isComponentNotPresent}.
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class
        Returns:
        true if component is present

      • isComponentPresent

        public boolean isComponentPresent(String cssClassName)
        Simply check if any component with a specific css class name is in parsys. Do not use it with negation, because of performance issues. In such cases use {#link isComponentNotPresent}.
        Parameters:
        cssClassName - component css class
        Returns:
        true if component is present

      • isComponentNotPresent

        public boolean isComponentNotPresent(Class<?> componentClass)
        Simply check if any component with a specific type is NOT in parsys. Do not use it with negation, because of performance issues. In such cases use {#link isComponentPresent}.
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class
        Returns:
        true if component is NOT present

      • isComponentNotPresent

        public boolean isComponentNotPresent(String cssClassName)
        Simply check if any component with a specific css class name is NOT in parsys. Do not use it with negation, because of performance issues. In such cases use {#link isComponentPresent}.
        Parameters:
        cssClassName - component css class
        Returns:
        true if component is NOT present

      • getFirstComponentOfType

        public <T> T getFirstComponentOfType(Class<T> componentClass)
        Get the first element of type componentClass. This is alias for getNthComponentOfType(Class componentClass, 0).
        Type Parameters:
        T - component class
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class name
        Returns:
        object of a componentClass injected with a proper scope

      • getNthComponentOfType

        public <T> T getNthComponentOfType(Class<T> componentClass,
                                   int n)
        Get the n-th element of type componentClass. Indexing starts at 0.
        Type Parameters:
        T - component class
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class name
        n - component index
        Returns:
        object of a componentClass injected with a proper scope

      • getComponent

        Type Parameters:
        T - component class
        Parameters:
        componentClass - component class name
        globalIndex - component global index
        Returns:

        public AemParsys removeComponent(int index)

        Returns:
        This AemParsys.
